entities.name: gilderoy
entities.description: Gilderoy Lockhart, a wizard and the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts. He is described as 'naughty' and 'sweetie' by the Healer.

entities.name: healer
entities.description: A motherly looking Healer who wears a tinsel wreath in her hair and is fond of Gilderoy Lockhart. She is described as 'lovely' and 'smiling warmly' at Harry and the others.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry, one of the visitors who has come to see Gilderoy Lockhart. He is mentioned alongside 'the others', but no further details are provided about him in this passage.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Gilderoy Lockhart, a wizard and the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts. He is described as 'well known' and 'precocious' by the Healer.

relationships.description: The Healer visits Gilderoy Lockhart in his room, bringing him autograph requests from Harry and the others.
Gilderoy Lockhart is referred to as 'he' and 'him', indicating that he is the same person as Lockhart.
